source_file: ACC The Santa Palooza Masterpiece 2012 Nana Splits Ice Cream Parlor 2012 The Santa Palooza Masterpiece.docx

houses.name: Nana Split’s Ice Cream Parlor
houses.description: A part of the North Pole Collection, designed by Department 56-inspired by magic and charming legends, bringing Christmas dreams to life for the young and the young-at-heart. Part of the Santa’s Sweet Shop Series. After a long day of making toys, Santa’s elves love to stop at Nana’s for ice cream treats. Hand-crafted and hand-painted porcelain lit building. Includes adapter cord.
houses.notes: Product Description  2012.
